dublin_core.dcvalue: Evaluating patient centered care PCC is crucial to its improvement This pilot study tested the feasibility of an electronic format to assess PCC during hospitalization Using a validated indicator of PCC embedded on a mobile device 86 older adults evaluated its delivery by registered nurses Patients older than 85 years rated PCC poorer than those who were younger r 0 22 P 04 The electronic format was appraised as feasible it performed well and took on average 30 minutes to complete
Evaluating patient-centered care: feasibility of electronic data collection in hospitalized older adults.
